LanguageData.GeneRemoverNoPowerEjectedMessage: {PAWN_labelShort} was ejected from a gene remover due to lack of power.
LanguageData.GeneRemover_BaseRemovalHoursTooltip: The time it takes gene remover to remove any gene, in hours.
LanguageData.GeneRemover_BaseRecoveryDaysTooltip: The recovery time after a successful procedure, in days.
LanguageData.GeneRemover_MetabolicModifier: Additional recovery time per metabolic efficiency (d)
LanguageData.GeneRemover_MetabolicModifierTooltip: The additional recovery time per metabolic efficiency, in days. Calculated as (value * gene metabolic efficiency)
